topic.title: Tuberculosis Therapeutic Regimen Act - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Therapeutic Regimen Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.57)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tuberculosis Treatment Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.16)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tuberculosis Treatment Not Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.19)
SHALL contain Tuberculosis case observation (CONF:652, CONF:653, CONF:654, CONF:646, CONF:647, CONF:648, CONF:649, CONF:655)
SHALL conform to PHCR Therapeutic Regimen Act template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.57)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1940)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1941)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="133877004" Therapeutic regimen (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1943)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1944)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tuberculosis Treatment Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.16)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Tuberculosis Treatment Not Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.19)
SHALL contain Tuberculosis case observation (CONF:652, CONF:653, CONF:654, CONF:646, CONF:647, CONF:648, CONF:649, CONF:655)
